name: Scrapper_Melee.Battle_Axe
display_help: You can wield a Battle Axe and master a variety of powerful Lethal attacks. Battle Axe is a slow but powerful weapon that has a tendency to send foes flying. This massive weapon has a bonus to hit.

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Battle_Axe.Beheader
powers.display_help: This is an attempt to remove your opponent's head from his neck with your Battle Axe. This attack is fairly quick for such a large weapon, and can knock down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Battle_Axe.Confront
powers.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Very Fast

powers.display_help: You spin your Battle Axe in a huge arc, attacking all nearby foes. This attack deals moderate damage to any foe it hits, and can knock them down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Battle_Axe.Cleave
powers.display_help: This is an attempt to split your opponent in two with one fell swoop of your Battle Axe. It is an extremely devastating attack that deals massive damage and can knock foes to the ground. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
